title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Work with our product team to build beautiful, responsive web interfaces. You'll collaborate closely with designers and backend engineers to ship features used by thousands of users.

title: Full Stack Engineer Intern
description: Join our core engineering team and build end-to-end features across our SaaS platform. Expect real responsibilities and fast-paced growth.

title: ML Research Intern
description: Assist research scientists in training and evaluating large language models. Requires strong math and Python skills.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build scalable microservices and APIs for our cloud infrastructure product. Great opportunity to learn distributed systems.

title: Global AI Hackathon 2025
description: 48-hour hackathon focused on building AI-powered tools for social good. Open to all students worldwide. Teams of 2-4.

title: iOS App Developer Intern
description: Help us build the next generation of our iOS productivity app used by 500K+ users. You'll write Swift, fix bugs, and ship features in a fast agile cycle.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Analyze product data, build dashboards, and develop predictive models to help our clients make smarter business decisions.

title: DevOps Intern
description: Work on CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure automation, and monitoring systems. Ideal for students interested in cloud and platform engineering.

title: Open Source Hackathon â€“ Web3
description: Build decentralized applications on Ethereum or Solana over 72 hours. All levels welcome. Mentors available.

title: Product Design Intern
description: Create wireframes, prototypes, and final designs for our client projects. Collaborate with engineers to bring your designs to life.

title: Software Engineering Intern - Cloud Infrastructure
description: Join the Azure compute team to help build scalable, reliable cloud infrastructure. You will work on core services that power millions of virtual machines globally, gaining experience with distributed systems.

title: Frontend Development Intern
description: Contribute to the user interface of Stripe's developer tools and payment dashboards. You'll work with a modern tech stack to create intuitive and robust user experiences for businesses worldwide.

title: Machine Learning Research Intern
description: Work with cutting-edge AI researchers on developing and implementing novel machine learning models. Projects may involve natural language processing, computer vision, or reinforcement learning applications.

title: Data Science Intern - E-commerce Analytics
description: Analyze vast datasets to uncover insights into customer behavior and product performance for Amazon Retail. You will develop predictive models and contribute to data-driven decision making.

title: Backend Software Engineer Intern
description: Help build and maintain the robust backend services that power Coinbase's cryptocurrency exchange platform. You will work on high-throughput, low-latency systems ensuring secure transactions.

title: Product Design Intern (UI/UX)
description: Collaborate with product managers and engineers to craft intuitive and delightful user experiences for Figma's design tools. You'll contribute to wireframing, prototyping, and user research.

title: DevOps / SRE Intern
description: Join the Site Reliability Engineering team to ensure the scalability and reliability of Netflix's streaming platform. You will work on automation, monitoring, and infrastructure-as-code.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst Intern
description: Assist in monitoring, detecting, and responding to security incidents within enterprise networks. You will gain hands-on experience with security tools and threat intelligence platforms.

title: Full Stack Engineer - Startup Intern
description: Be an integral part of a fast-paced health-tech startup, contributing to both frontend and backend development of our innovative platform. You will have a direct impact on product features and architecture.

title: Game Development Intern
description: Join a team working on Unreal Engine or one of Epic's game titles. You'll contribute to various aspects of game development, from programming gameplay mechanics to tool development.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect Intern
description: Work with experienced architects to design scalable and robust cloud solutions for enterprise clients. You will assist in translating business requirements into technical specifications on the Salesforce platform.

title: Mobile Development Intern (iOS/Android)
description: Develop features and improve performance for Meta's core mobile applications (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp). You will gain experience with large-scale mobile development and user experience.

title: Quantum Computing Research Intern
description: Contribute to cutting-edge research in quantum computing, exploring algorithms, hardware, or software development for quantum systems. You will work with the Qiskit framework and quantum hardware.

title: Data Engineering Intern
description: Build and optimize large-scale data pipelines for processing and analyzing massive datasets. You'll work with Spark, Delta Lake, and other big data technologies to ensure data quality and accessibility.

title: AR/VR Software Development Intern
description: Join the team developing innovative tools and features for AR/VR experiences within the Unity ecosystem. You will work on cutting-edge immersive technologies and real-time 3D graphics.
